response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,500,000 by you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,400,000. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring you receive the best possible value for your investment. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your business growth and success.", "product_price": 1400000}
